## RowActionContext interface

Context object provided to row-specific action handlers, including the specific row being operated on. [ActionContextBase](./list-display.actioncontextbase.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface RowActionContext<TRow = any, TRowId = string | number> extends ActionContextBase<TRow, TRowId> 
```
**Extends:** [ActionContextBase](./list-display.actioncontextbase.md)<!-- -->&lt;TRow, TRowId&gt;
